summary: Applied AI researcher and developer with a strong foundation in computer vision, machine learning, and systems design. Experienced in deploying large-scale biometric recognition systems, visual tracking pipelines, and federated learning setups. Skilled in building robust end-to-end AI solutions with a focus on performance, reliability, and scalability.

contributions: Designed long-range face recognition system using PoE cameras, improving recognition by 30%.
Deployed biometric pipelines in Docker containers, reducing deployment time by 15%.
Created a scalable Elasticsearch feature index for 1.5M face embeddings, improving search efficiency by 35%.
Automated deployment using Jenkins CI/CD, ensuring consistent rollouts and minimal downtime.
Developed Python-based scraping tools with Selenium, improving data acquisition by 30%.
Enhanced PostgreSQL queries using virtual tables and optimized system monitoring with Prometheus/Grafana.
Built CI/CD flows using Jenkins and Ansible for streamlined automation in Unix environments.
Built Django-based REST APIs with JWT authentication using Djoser.
Orchestrated asynchronous tasks using Celery and RabbitMQ, boosting backend responsiveness.
Ensured production readiness with Pytest-based unit and integration tests.

education.degree: Master of Science - Data Science and Artificial Intelligence
Bachelor of Science - Computer Science and Software Engineering

projects.title: Heavy Rain Image Restoration
highlights: Designed a two-stage rain image restoration pipeline combining physics-based modeling and conditional GANs.
Enhanced visual quality under heavy rain using depth-guided denoising; evaluated with PSNR and SSIM metrics.

projects.title: Real-Time Face Recognition and Tracking System
highlights: Developed an end-to-end facial recognition and tracking system using ONNX models (SCRFD + AdaFace).
Integrated Telegram API for real-time alerting, enabling deployment on surveillance setups including CCTV and webcams.

projects.title: Loan Prediction with Personalized Advice using LLMs
highlights: Trained a logistic regression model to classify loan applications.
Used Gemini 1.5 Flash to offer targeted LLM-generated suggestions to improve applicant approval chances.

projects.title: Federated Learning on MedMNIST Chest Dataset
highlights: Built a federated learning pipeline for chest disease classification using PyTorch and MedMNIST dataset.
Collaborated in a team for performance tuning and reproducibility during a Kaggle-style challenge.

achievements: Led a palm biometric recognition system project, enhancing organizational biometric capabilities.
Built and maintained a vector search system for facial embeddings with over 1.5 million images.
Implemented real-time surveillance system integrating facial recognition and Telegram alerts.
Volunteer at AIT, mentoring peers in Kaggle challenges and machine learning workshops.
Ex-member of the ML Club at Inha University, organized multiple coding events and talks.
